title: 9.) Top 40 Countdown - I Want Less Conflict in My Marriage
description:
Jennifer argues with her husband about his mother and sister who recently moved too close for Jennifer's comfort. - Dr. Laura: "Show your husband respect by letting him have his own opinion."

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
